TEXT.English: Extra production from specialists; extra production from workshops and lumbermills; extra commerce from watermills; double production speed for factories and coal plants
TEXT.Chinese: Extra production from specialists; extra production from workshops and lumbermills; extra commerce from watermills; double production speed for factories and coal plants

TEXT.English: Double available slots for artists, scientists and engineers; extra research from specialists
TEXT.Chinese: Double available slots for artists, scientists and engineers; extra research from specialists

TEXT.English: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness
TEXT.Chinese: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness

TEXT.English: Cities with state religion construct buildings faster
TEXT.Chinese: Cities with state religion construct buildings faster

TEXT.English: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from windmills, nature preserves and marine preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.Chinese: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from windmills, nature preserves and marine preserves; can spend gold to finish building production

TEXT.English: Extra food from specialists; reduced food from farms, plantations, cottages, hamlets, villages and towns; can spend gold to finish unit production
TEXT.Chinese: Extra food from specialists; reduced food from farms, plantations, cottages, hamlets, villages and towns; can spend gold to finish unit production

TEXT.English: No state religion; increased science in all cities; double production speed for hospital, university, laboratory; can build wonders that require a state religion
TEXT.Chinese: No state religion; increased science in all cities; double production speed for hospital, university, laboratory; can build wonders that require a state religion

TEXT.English: Can capture workers; extra production from quarries; extra commerce from mines and plantations
TEXT.Chinese: Can capture workers; extra production from quarries; extra commerce from mines and plantations

TEXT.English: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions
TEXT.Chinese: Double available slots for priests; cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions

TEXT.English: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population
TEXT.Chinese: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population

TEXT.English: Additional units without upkeep; units are produced using food; extra food and commerce from forts; extra happiness from castles
TEXT.Chinese: Additional units without upkeep; units are produced using food; extra food and commerce from forts; extra happiness from castles

TEXT.English: Extra commerce from tiles without improvement; extra commerce from camps and pastures; double production speed for palace
TEXT.Chinese: Extra commerce from tiles without improvement; extra commerce from camps and pastures; double production speed for palace

TEXT.English: No maintenance costs from number of cities; extra espionage from specialists
TEXT.Chinese: No maintenance costs from number of cities; extra espionage from specialists

TEXT.English: Double available slots for statesmen; increased great people birth rate
TEXT.Chinese: Double available slots for statesmen; increased great people birth rate

TEXT.English: Extra happiness in largest cities; double production speed for aqueduct, forge, library, market and jail
TEXT.Chinese: Extra happiness in largest cities; double production speed for aqueduct, forge, library, market and jail

TEXT.English: Extra experience for units within borders; increased research in capital; extra food from paddy fields
TEXT.Chinese: Extra experience for units within borders; increased research in capital; extra food from paddy fields

TEXT.English: Increased production and gold in capital
TEXT.Chinese: Increased production and gold in capital

TEXT.English: Increased great general birth rate; extra production from towns; extra happiness from news press and broadcasting tower
TEXT.Chinese: Increased great general birth rate; extra production from towns; extra happiness from news press and broadcasting tower

TEXT.English: Extra free specialist in all cities
TEXT.Chinese: Extra free specialist in all cities

TEXT.English: Reduced worker cost; extra production from pastures; extra commerce from farms and orchards
TEXT.Chinese: Reduced worker cost; extra production from pastures; extra commerce from farms and orchards

TEXT.English: Increased growth rate for cottages, hamlets and villages; extra commerce from villages and towns
TEXT.Chinese: Increased growth rate for cottages, hamlets and villages; extra commerce from villages and towns

TEXT.English: Increased food in capital; reduced commerce from trade routes; increased production speed for granaries
TEXT.Chinese: Increased food in capital; reduced commerce from trade routes; increased production speed for granaries

TEXT.English: Extra trade route in all cities; happiness from oasis
TEXT.Chinese: Extra trade route in all cities; happiness from oasis

TEXT.English: Increased commerce in capital; extra commerce from plantations and slave plantations; double production speed for customs house
TEXT.Chinese: Increased commerce in capital; extra commerce from plantations and slave plantations; double production speed for customs house

TEXT.English: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
TEXT.Chinese: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations

TEXT.English: Increased wonder production speed; extra unhappiness from state religion; extra happiness from pagan temples
TEXT.Chinese: Increased wonder production speed; extra unhappiness from state religion; extra happiness from pagan temples

TEXT.English: Increased building production in cities with state religion
TEXT.Chinese: Increased building production in cities with state religion

TEXT.English: Increased great people birth rate in cities with state religion
TEXT.Chinese: Increased great people birth rate in cities with state religion

TEXT.English: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries
TEXT.Chinese: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries

TEXT.English: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for cottages, hamlets and villages
TEXT.Chinese: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for cottages, hamlets and villages

TEXT.English: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; extra gold on city conquest
TEXT.Chinese: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; extra gold on city conquest

TEXT.English: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes
TEXT.Chinese: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes

TEXT.English: Extra commerce in capital from colonies; extra experience for water units; can buy and use slaves
TEXT.Chinese: Extra commerce in capital from colonies; extra experience for water units; can buy and use slaves

TEXT.English: Can draft units; extra production from forts
TEXT.Chinese: Can draft units; extra production from forts
